text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Here's my thoughts. There are two kinds of people in this world.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Those who understand when to swallow dried squid, and those who don't.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And all said, I'm the latter… Chew as I want, it's too hard to get that "now!" feeling.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ―Huh, you look like you suffer the same issue.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Then let's forge them together.…… A pair of jaws as strong as the Giant Squid's!
